title: Avenged Sevenfold Bash Former Label: 'Imbeciles' [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 10 hours ago 10 
Avenged Sevenfold guitarist Zacky Vengeance ripped the band's former label Warner Music, calling the people involved with it "imbeciles." 
As reported, A7X had a rough breakup with the label, which then pulled a surprising move of scheduling a sudden release of a best-of album for December 2 as soon as rumors of A7X releasing a new record on December 9 surfaced. 
Anynow, Zacky told The National Student : "As far as our old label is concerned, we had no idea they were even going to attempt any of that. 
"We didn't know about [the best-of record] until the album was coming up; we actually thought it was quite hysterical when they were misled by a fake tweet that Chris Jericho sent out [the band teamed up with Chris to mislead the public and draw the arttention away from the actual surprise release], and that just kind of shows what kind of a label they were in the first place that they were led on by that rumor. 
"And that's, obviously, why we wouldn't want to be with a team of people that were - I mean, I hate to use the word 'imbeciles,' but I'll go ahead and use the word - imbeciles."
